net.floodlightcontroller.util

Class ParseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.util.ParseUtils

  • public class ParseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple class to assist in parsing hex or decimal primitive types from String to their respective types. Use this in place of e.g. Integer.decode() if you wish to avoid unnecessarily creating objects when you want just the primitive type.
    Author:
    rizard

      • parseHexOrDecBool

        public static boolean parseHexOrDecBool(java.lang.String s)
        Convert any number to a boolean, where any positive number is true and zero or negative number is false. The largest supported type is a Long. Hex is expected to have a leading "0x".
        Parameters:
        s -
        Returns:
        true or false
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
